name: Leon Trotsky
description: Russian revolutionary, Marxist theorist, and Soviet politician. Key organizer of the October Revolution and founder of the Red Army. Later exiled and assassinated for opposing Stalinism.

name: Vladimir Lenin
description: Russian revolutionary, politician, and political theorist. Leader of the Bolshevik Party and the October Revolution of 1917. Founded the Soviet Union and developed Leninism as a variant of Marxism.
